tuv.seg: The head of State is called the President
Tugtar an teideal Uachtarán ar cheann Stáit na hÉireann
Introducing the office of the Irish President
Tugann an cháipéis seo cur síos gairid ar an Uachtarán
The head of State in Ireland is known as the President
Tugtar an teideal Uachtarán ar Cheann Stáit na hÉireann
Find out about the important functions of the Irish President
Faigh amach tuilleadh faoi na feidhmeanna tábhachtacha an tUachtarán Éireannach
President - Summoning and dissolving the Dáil
An tUachtarán - an Dáil a chomóradh agus a lánscoir
This document describes the functions of the President in summoning and dissolving the Dail
Tá cur síos sa cháipéis seo ar fheidhmeanna an Uachtaráin maidir leis an Dáil a chomóradh agus a lánscoir
President - Convening the Oireachtas
An tUachtarán - Tithe an Oireachtais a Chomóradh
This document describes the President of Ireland's power to convene a meeting of either or both Houses of the Oireachtas
Tá cur síos anseo ar chumhacht an Uachtaráin ceachtar de Thithe an Oireachtais, nó iad araon, a chomóradh
President of Ireland and legislation
An tUachtarán agus reachtaíocht
The President of Ireland has certain powers in relation to legislation
Tá cumhachtaí áirithe ag an Uachtarán maidir le reachtaíocht
Overview of President's powers
Forbhreathnú cumhachtaí an tUachtarán
Inauguration and removal of the President
Uachtarán a gharim agus a chur as oifig
This document describes the inauguration of the President of Ireland and the circumstances in which the President may be removed from office
Tá cur síos sa cháipéis seo ar Uachtarán a ghairm agus ar na cuinsí inar féidir an tUachtarán a chur as oifig
President - representing the people
An tUachtarán - ionadaí na ndaoine
The President's role in representing the people of Ireland
Tá cur síos sa chápéis seo ar ról an Uachtaráin mar Ionadaí na nDaoine
The Council of State is an advisory group that aids and counsels the President
Cur síos atá anseo ar an gComhairle Stáit a chuireann cúnamh agus comhairle ar fáil don Uachtarán
The Presidential Commission steps in to perform the duties of the President if they are absent, ill or in the event of death or resignation of the President
Comhlíonfaidh Coimisiún an Uachtaráin dualgais an Uachtaráin má bhíonn siad as láthair, ar míthreoir nó má chailltear iad nó má éiríonn iad as oifig
The President has an important role in appointing people to various offices of State
Tá ról tábhachtach ag an Uachtarán i gceapadh daoine chun oifigí Stáit éagsúla
President and the Defence Forces
An tUachtarán agus na Fórsaí Cosanta
The President's role as Supreme Commander of the Defence Forces in Ireland
Tá cur síos anseo ar an Uachtarán mar Ardcheannasaí na bhFórsaí Cosanta
President's Award - Gaisce
Gradam an Uachtaráin – Gaisce
The President's Award is the President's 'National Challenge' Award made to young people in Ireland between the ages of 15 and 25 years
Tá plé déanta sa cháipéis seo ar Dhuais an Uachtaráin, Duais Náisiúnta Dúshláin an Uachtaráin a bhronntar ar dhaoine óga idir 15 agus 25 bliain d'aois
Most Read in "Government in Ireland"
Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Rialtas in Éirinn"
Presidential Election in Ireland
Bunchearta faoi Bhunreacht na hÉireann
